= Contribute =

Do you want to help us out?

Check out the source and submit patches under [http://code.google.com/p/cf-password-generator/issues/list the Issues tab]. Or you can leave a comment on this page and, if you have a compelling enough reason, we'll give you contributor or committer access to the project.

This is our first open source project, so we're open to comments, critiques and questions!
